articles.title: Zoom Fires Its President Days After Company Cut 1,300 Jobs - NDTV
articles.description: Zoom laid off 1,300 employees or 15 per cent of its workforce in February this year.
articles.content:
Greg Tomb joined Zoom in June 2022.
Video conferencing platform Zoom has fired its President Greg Tomb, according to a report in the BBC, which cited a regulatory filing by the company. Mr Tomb's co… [+2316 chars]

articles.title: Airbnb Lays Off 30% Recruiting Staff: Report - NDTV
articles.description: The job cuts affected 0.4 per cent of the Airbnb's total workforce of 6,800.
articles.content:
Airbnb added that it is not an indication of more widespread layoffs.
Home rental firm Airbnb has laid off 30 per cent of its recruiting staff this week, according to a report in Bloomberg. The job … [+1996 chars]
